violations.description: Ensure touch targets have sufficient size and space
violations.help: All touch targets must be 24px large, or leave sufficient space

relatedNodes.html: Change Password

any.message: Target has insufficient size because it is partially obscured (smallest space is 12.6px by 24px, should be at least 24px by 24px)

relatedNodes.html: Change Password

any.message: Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 12.6px instead of at least 24px.

nodes.html: <a class="doc-link" href="https://developer.hashicorp.com/boundary/docs/concepts/domain-model/scopes#projects" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener" title="Get help for this topic">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size because it is partially obscured (smallest space is 12.6px by 24px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 12.6px instead of at least 24px.

violations.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

any.message: Element does not have an alt attribute
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element has no title attribute
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
